metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5069 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The (1) filesystem::get_wml_location function in filesystem.cpp and (2) is_legal_file function in filesystem_boost.cpp in Battle for Wesnoth before 1.12.3 and 1.13.x before 1.13.1 allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via vectors related to inclusion of .pbl files from WML.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> incomplete fix lead to CVE-2015-5070

criterions.comment: wesnoth-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
